rendered:
拲拲拲
Links: aedict | jisho | koohii | hanziyuan | kanshudo | wiktionary | purpleculture | rtega | trainchinese | bkrs | humanum | Baido | yw11 | Pleco Search | Pleco

Related Character(s): 㭟
Связанный символ (и): 㭟

拲字的基本解释

拲
gǒng
古代的一种刑罚，把双手铐在一起：“上罪梏拲而桎。”
古代的刑具，木铐：“浸假而以杞柳为桎、拲、梏。”
恭敬。

拲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gǒng］
［《廣韻》居悚切，上腫，見。］
［《廣韻》居玉切，入燭，見。］
(1)古代刑罚的一种，即把双手铐在一起，状如拱手。
(2)指铐双手的木制刑具。

拲字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　拲； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页428第03
【唐韻】【正韻】居竦切【集韻】【韻會】古勇切，?音鞏。【說文】兩手同械也。【周禮·秋官·掌囚】上罪梏拲而桎。【註】拲者，兩手共一木也。在手曰梏，在足曰桎。　又【唐韻】居玉切【集韻】【韻會】拘玉切，?音鋦。又【集韻】丘勇切，音恐。又【集韻】【正韻】?居六切，音菊。義?同。◎按屋韻居六切，與沃韻居玉切相近，宜細分。　【說文】或从木作㭟。【長箋】拲似混拱，當从木。

拲字的源字形

字源演变：

金文小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
拲字的起名意思

暂无。

Strangle
Basic explanation of words
Strangle
gǒng
A punishment in ancient times, handcuffed hands together: "Be shackled by crime."
Ancient instrument of torture, wooden handcuffs: "Dip the fake and use Qiliu as shackles, shackles and shackles."
Respectfully.
Strangle
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［gǒng］
["Guangyun" is horrified and swollen on the top, see you. ]
["Guangyun" Juyu cut, enter the candle, see. ]
(1) A type of ancient punishment, that is, handcuffed hands together, like an arched hand.
(2) Refers to the wooden torture instrument that cuffs both hands.
Strangle
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji] [Hand Character Department] 　拲; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 428 03
[Tang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Ju Yu cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Gu Yong cut,? Yin Gong. [Said the text] Both hands are the same weapon. 【Zhou Li·Qiuguan·Prisoner in charge】The crime is shackled and fettered. [Note] For those who squeeze, there is a wood in both hands. Shackle in the hand, shackle in the foot.　[Tang Yun] Ju Yuqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Yu Yuqie,? Sound. [Jiyun] Qiu Yongqie, fear of sound. Also 【Ji Yun】【Zheng Yun】? Ju Liuqie, Yinju. Righteous? Same. ◎According to the six categories of House Yunju, it is similar to that of Woyunju, and should be subdivided.　【Speaking text】Or from wood to 㭟. 【Long note】It looks like a mixed arch, when it is from the wood.
Strangle

gǒng, jū, jú
сущ. * наручная канга (колодка), деревянные наручники
